Issue Summary
Title:
 Unable to access the Marketing database
Description
John Doe reported that he is unable to access the Marketing database from his workstation. He receives an error message stating, "Database connection failed: Access denied." This issue is impacting his ability to complete marketing reports and data analysis tasks.
Steps to Reproduce
John opens the Marketing application on his workstation.
He attempts to connect to the Marketing database.
An error message appears: "Database connection failed: Access denied."
Attachments
Screenshot of the error message: 
Error_Message_Screenshot.png
Log file: 
MarketingApp_Log.txt
Impact
Unable to generate marketing reports
Delayed data analysis
Potential impact on marketing campaigns
Priority and Justification
Priority:
 High
Justification:
 This issue affects critical business operations and needs immediate attention to avoid delays in marketing activities.
Assigned To
IT Support Team:
 Database Administration
Assigned Engineer:
 Jane Smith
Resolution Steps
Initial Assessment:
Verify network connectivity.
Check database server status.
Review access logs for any unusual activity.
Troubleshooting:
Reset John Doe's database access credentials.
Test database connection from a different workstation.
Check for recent changes or updates to the Marketing database server.
Solution Implementation:
Apply necessary fixes or configurations.
Test database access after implementation.
Confirm issue resolution with John Doe.
Comments
John Doe (7/20/2024, 10:15 AM):
 "I need access to the database urgently for the upcoming marketing report."
